submittedOn.description: The date the dividends income was added. It must be provided in the format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ

countryCode.description: A three-letter code that represents a country name. The value must in a ISO 3166-1 Alpha-3 format.

amountBeforeTax.description: The total amount of income (in UK pounds) before taking off any foreign tax. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

taxTakenOff.description: The total amount of foreign tax taken off income. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

specialWithholdingTax.description: The total amount of income (in UK pounds) before taking off any Special Withholding Tax (SWT). The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

foreignTaxCreditRelief.description: Boolean indicating whether Foreign Tax Credit Relief (FTCR) has been claimed.

taxableAmount.description: The total taxable amount on dividends. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

customerReferenceStockDividend.description: A reference the user supplies to identify the stock dividends income.

customerReferenceRedeemableShares.description: A reference the user supplies to identify the redeemable shares income.

customerReferenceBonusIssuesOfSecurities.description: A reference the user supplies to identify the bonus securities income.

customerReferenceCloseCompanyLoansWritte.description: A reference the user supplies to identify the close company loans written off income.

grossAmount.description: The gross amount of the dividends. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

stockDividend.description: Object that holds the key value for stock dividends income.

redeemableShares.description: Object that holds the key value for redeemable shares income.

bonusIssuesOfSecurities.description: Object that holds the key value for bonus issues of securities income.

closeCompanyLoansWrittenOff.description: Container that holds the key value for close company loans written off income.

items.description: A list of endpoint links that indicate possible actions related to the current resource.

href.description: The relative URL of the endpoint.

rel.description: A label for the endpoint, which describes how it is related to the current resource. The ‘rel’ will be ‘self’ where the action is retrieval of the same resource.

method.description: The HTTP method type for the endpoint.
